items.name: EasyList
items.description: The primary filter list that removes most adverts from international webpages.

items.name: EasyPrivacy
items.description: EasyPrivacy is an optional supplementary filter list that removes all forms of tracking.

items.name: Malware Domains
items.description: Blocks domains known to be used to distribute malware.

items.name: uBlock filters
items.description: Filters specific to uBlock Origin, maintained by Raymond Hill.

items.name: AdGuard Base Filter
items.description: The most comprehensive filter for blocking ads and trackers across all websites.
